abstract: Shiseido and Estee Lauder may be possible acquisition targets if Procter & Gamble wants to add more beauty products and increase penetration in emerging markets, a Sanford C. Bernstein analyst predicted.
snippet: Shiseido and Estee Lauder may be possible acquisition targets if Procter & Gamble wants to add more beauty products and increase penetration in emerging markets, a Sanford C. Bernstein analyst predicted.
lead_paragraph: Shiseido and Estée Lauder may be possible acquisition targets if Procter & Gamble wants to add more beauty products and increase penetration in emerging markets, a Sanford C. Bernstein analyst predicted Monday.

headline.main: Procter & Gamble May Hunt for Beauty Company
